TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DragEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class DragEventArgs Inherits RoutedEventArgs
public ref class DragEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

summary.span: 包含與所有拖放事件 (、、 和 ) 相關的引數。

span.span: Contains arguments relevant to all drag-and-drop events (, , , and ).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.DragDropEffects AllowedEffects { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.DragDropEffects AllowedEffects
Public ReadOnly Property AllowedEffects As DragDropEffects
public: property System::Windows::DragDropEffects AllowedEffects { System::Windows::DragDropEffects get(); };

summary.span: 取得 列舉型別 (Enumeration) 的成員，其指定來源拖曳事件所允許的作業。

span.span: Gets a member of the enumeration that specifies which operations are allowed by the originator of the drag event.

value.span: 列舉型別的成員，其指定來源拖曳事件所允許的作業。

span.span: A member of the enumeration that specifies which operations are allowed by the originator of the drag event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖放作業所呼叫的起始時方法，來指定允許的作業的成員列舉型別。When a drag-and-drop operation is initiated by calling the method, permissible operations are specified with a member of the enumeration. 比方說，當拖曳唯讀檔案拖放到起始端應會指出檔案可以複製，但不是會移動。For example, when dragging a read-only file the drag initiator should indicate that the file can be copied, but not moved. 拖曳的資料上執行作業，請先檢查這個屬性，以確定允許的作業。Before attempting to perform an operation on dragged data, examine this property to ensure that the operation is allowed.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.IDataObject Data { get; }
.property instance class System.Windows.IDataObject Data
Public ReadOnly Property Data As IDataObject
public: property System::Windows::IDataObject ^ Data { System::Windows::IDataObject ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得資料物件，其中含有與對應的拖曳事件關聯的資料。

span.span: Gets a data object that contains the data associated with the corresponding drag event.

value.span: 資料物件，其中含有與對應的拖曳事件關聯的資料。

span.span: A data object that contains the data associated with the corresponding drag event..

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.DragDropEffects Effects { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.DragDropEffects Effects
Public Property Effects As DragDropEffects
public: property System::Windows::DragDropEffects Effects { System::Windows::DragDropEffects get(); void set(System::Windows::DragDropEffects value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定目標拖放作業。

span.span: Gets or sets the target drag-and-drop operation.

value.span: 列舉的成員，指定目標拖放作業。

span.span: A member of the enumeration specifying the target drag-and-drop operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，這個屬性中指定的效果會判斷滑鼠游標拖放作業的目標。By default, the effect specified in this property determines the mouse cursor for the target of a drag-and-drop operation. 這非常有用意見反應提供給使用者時卸除對應的物件，會發生的作業。This is useful to provide feedback to the user on the operation that will occur when the corresponding object is dropped.

public System.Windows.DragDropKeyStates KeyStates { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.Windows.DragDropKeyStates KeyStates
Public ReadOnly Property KeyStates As DragDropKeyStates
public: property System::Windows::DragDropKeyStates KeyStates { System::Windows::DragDropKeyStates get(); };

summary.span: 取得旗標列舉型別，表示 SHIFT、CTRL 和 ALT 鍵的目前狀態，以及滑鼠按鍵的狀態。

span.span: Gets a flag enumeration indicating the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.

value.span: 其中一個或多個 旗標列舉型別的成員。

span.span: One or more members of the flag enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據特定的索引鍵的狀態而定，您可以調整拖放作業的效果。The effect of a drag-and-drop operation can be adjusted depending on the state of a particular key. 例如，資料可能是複製或移動根據拖放作業期間是否按下 CTRL 或 SHIFT 鍵。For example, data may either be copied or moved depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation.
